name: peen
description: Minimal Node CLI agent for Ollama with streaming + run(cmd) tool.

scripts.build:
mkdir -p ~/.local/share/peen/prompt ~/.local/bin && cp peen.js ollama.js tools.js LICENSE VERSION ~/.local/share/peen/ && cp prompt/system.txt prompt/tool_repair.txt ~/.local/share/peen/prompt/ && chmod +x ~/.local/share/peen/peen.js && printf '#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail
exec node ~/.local/share/peen/peen.js "$@"
' > ~/.local/bin/peen && chmod +x ~/.local/bin/peen
